Inflation Costs
Taxes are charged on the nominal capital gain and NOT on the real capital gain you earnedâ¦
Due to inflation, the real capital gain you earn is LOWER than the nominal capital gain
Inflation
Unfair Tax: People who make capital gains end up paying more taxes than they should due to inflation
ï¿¼
Inflation Costs
Taxes are charged on the nominal capital gain and NOT on the real capital gain you earnedâ¦
Due to inflation, the real capital gain you earn is LOWER than the nominal capital gain
The higher inflation is, the larger is the difference between your real capital gain and your nominal capital gain
Inflation
Unfair Tax: People who make capital gains end up paying more taxes than they should due to inflation
ï¿¼
Inflation Costs
Taxes are charged on the nominal capital gain and NOT on the real capital gain you earnedâ¦
Due to inflation, the real capital gain you earn is LOWER than the nominal capital gain
The higher inflation is, the larger is the difference between your real capital gain and your nominal capital gain
The higher inflation is, the larger is the difference between what you should pay in taxes (if charged on the real k gain) and what you actually pay (because they are charged on the nominal k gain)

The higher inflation is, the larger is the difference between what you should pay in taxes (if charged on the real k gain) and what you actually pay (because they are charged on the nominal k gain)
